<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>stylized_text_1/css</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var clientStateParameter = api.state.tab3verticalAMetric1ShowHealth;
    
    if (clientStateParameter === 'green') {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 500; color:#008000}';
    } else if (clientStateParameter === 'amber') {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 500; color:#FFA500}';
    } else if (clientStateParameter === 'red') {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 500; color:#FF0000}';
    } else {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 500; color: rgb(var(--now-color--secondary-3))}';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-18 12:57:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>18713df11bfb35d4dba1c3e5464bcb61</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_1/css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_18713df11bfb35d4dba1c3e5464bcb61</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-22 11:17:46</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>18d1cae55c60000001</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_18713df11bfb35d4dba1c3e5464bcb61</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-18 13:06:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>faa3f1b51bbf35d4dba1c3e5464bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-18 13:06:43</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
